BBK01.SUD213: New business (volumes) of German banks / Loans for consumption to households with a floating rate or an initial rate fixation up to 1 year

General: Estimated. The volume of new business is extrapolated to form the underlying total using the Horvitz-Thompson estimator. Loans for consumption are definded as loans granted for the purpose of personal use in the consumption of goods and services. Excluding overdrafts. p = Provisional
